original_description: Nextdoor is a local social media platform that connects neighbors and businesses, allowing small businesses to create an online presence, engage with local customers through posts, and grow their reputation via recommendations.

excel_data.Description of deal & business: Data-driven marketing and communication solutions by leveraging advanced analytics, proprietary technology, and creativity, it provides integrated services across data & research, influencer marketing, conversion marketing, and live engagement. Client portfolio from fashion, beauty, energy, banking, and insurance industries. The company maintains a high client retention rate. Increasing revenue and EBITDA projections. Transaction scope is 100 % of the shares.

High Growth Fulfillment software and logistics company with reputable VC investors seeks funding of 25-35 MEUR offering a significant minority in a  C-round financing. Financing is intended for helping to continue to internal growth (>30%) and finance acquisition of related companies.

The company offers development and maintenance services of IT systems for SMEs and has high security standards through its own data centre. The service portfolio also includes the implementation of IT projects and solutions for hosted work environments, conference systems, telephony, hardware and software. original_description: Navmii is a navigation and mapping company offering products and services such as mobile navigation, map data, dashcam applications, and vehicle tracking solutions, enabling businesses to integrate navigation and mapping features into their applications.

excel_data.Short Title: IT Services & Proprietary Software Company with strong recurring Revenue
excel_data.Description of deal & business: This provider delivers IT services, custom development, and application management to over 100 active clients across sectors such as finance, public institutions, and international organizations. With a solid base of long-term contracts and proprietary software solutions, the company maintains a high share of recurring revenue (70–80%) and stable profitability. Transaction scope is 100 % of the shares.

excel_data.Short Title: IT Consulting & Software Development Partner for Financial Sector
excel_data.Description of deal & business: A fast-growing Central and Eastern Europe-based IT consultancy, serving top-tier clients in banking, insurance, telco, and energy. The company offers end-to-end services across IT consulting, software development, business intelligence, ESG solutions, QA, and testing. Long-term relationships with major financial institutions and delivers large-scale digital transformation projects.A 100% equity stake is offered, with current management open to supporting a structured transition.
